cancel_subscription.explanation: You will be unsubscribed from your current plan by clicking the unsubscribe button below.
cancel_subscription.title: We are sorry to see you go.
cancel_subscription.unknown_error_occurred: An unknown error occurred, please try again later.

checkout.coupon_applied: Your coupon code has been applied
checkout.days_trial_plural: You will be charged after {{count}} days.
checkout.paypal_instructions: Clicking 'continue' will bring you to the PayPal site.
checkout.periods_trial: You will be charged after one {{period}}.
checkout.welcome_description: Thank you for subscribing to {{siteName}}. Please enjoy all our content.

choose_offer.offer_not_found: Offer not found, please try reloading the page
choose_offer.title: Choose plan

login.field_is_not_valid_email: Please re-enter your email details and try again.
login.wrong_email: Please check your email and try again.

personal_details.birth_date_not_valid: Birth of date is not a valid date
personal_details.title: Personal details

registration.failed_to_create: An error occurred. Please try again later.
registration.invalid_password: Use a minimum of 8 characters (case sensitive) with at least one number
registration.password_helper_text: Use a minimum of 8 characters (case sensitive) with at least one number
registration.user_exists: There is already a user with this email address
registration.email_updates: Yes, I want to receive {{siteName}} updates by email.

renew_subscription.explanation: By clicking the button below you can renew your plan.

reset.forgot_text: We will send you an email with instructions on how to reset your password.
reset.invalid_token: The reset password link is invalid or has expired. Please try resetting your password again.
reset.not_sure: Not sure that was the right email address?
reset.password_helper_text: Use a minimum of 8 characters (case sensitive) with at least one number
reset.text: If you want to edit your password, click 'YES, Reset' to receive password reset instruction on your mail

subscription_cancelled.message: You have been successfully unsubscribed. Your current plan will expire on {{date}}
subscription_cancelled.title: Miss you already.

subscription_renewed.message: You have been successfully resubscribed. Your fee will be {{price}} starting from {{date}}
subscription_renewed.title: Your subscription has been renewed
